transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. People ride in me to go places. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I can be many colors
👪 Families often use me
🚦 I stop at red lights

transport.question: I go on tracks and carry many people. Choo choo!

hints.text: 🛤️ I need a special road
💨 I can be very long
🔔 I often have a loud whistle

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people very far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I go very high
💺 People sit inside me
✈️ I have wings

transport.question: I float on the water and help people travel across the sea.

hints.text: 🌊 I'm bigger than a duck
⚓️ I need water to move
🚢 Some are very big and can carry lots of cars!

transport.question: I have two wheels and you need to pedal me to move. What am I?

hints.text: ⛑️ You should wear a helmet when using me
🚲 You can ride me in the park
🦵 I need your legs to move

transport.question: I am big and yellow and take children to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I have flashing lights
👦 I carry lots of students
🎒 I stop at bus stops

transport.question: I can fly high but I don't have wings. I have a spinning blade on top.

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one place
🚨 I'm used for rescues
⬆️ I can go straight up

transport.question: I race on a track, very fast, with other cars. Vroom, vroom!

hints.text: 🏆 I try to win the race
🏁 I go round and round the same track
⛽️ I need fuel

transport.question: I travel into space, far beyond the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🧑‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me
🪐 I go to the moon and planets
🚀 I am very powerful

transport.question: I help put out fires. I am red and have a loud siren.

hints.text: 🧑‍🚒 Firefighters use me
💧 I have a hose that sprays water
🚨 I hurry to emergencies

bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I make honey, but I am not a bear. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I live in a hive with lots of friends.
🌼 I fly from flower to flower to get nectar.
🍯 People eat the sweet food I make.

bug.question: I hop around and eat plants. I'm green and have long legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to eat leaves.
🐸 I'm not a frog, but I can jump really high!
🎶 You might hear me chirping in the summer.

bug.question: I have bright wings and fly around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I used to be a caterpillar.
🌈 My wings are colorful.
🌸 I drink nectar from flowers.

bug.question: I build big hills in your yard and march in lines. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small and work hard with my friends.
🏠 We live in a colony under the ground.
🍰 I like to take crumbs of food back to my home.

bug.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. I like to eat leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I leave a slimy trail behind me.
🥬 I love to eat garden plants!
🌧️ You often see me after it rains.

bug.question: I have many legs and spin a web. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I use my web to catch food.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🏠 You might find my web in a corner of your house.

bug.question: I light up at night. I'm a flying bug. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I glow in the dark.
🔦 My light helps me find friends.
🌃 You can see me on summer nights.

bug.question: I drink blood and buzz around your head. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I can be very annoying!
⚠️ Some people get itchy bumps after I bite them.
💧 I need water to lay my eggs.

bug.question: I look like a stick and hide in the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am long and thin.
🌳 My camouflage helps me hide from predators.
🍃 I eat leaves and blend in with the branches.

bug.question: I'm a bug that can make a loud noise by rubbing my wings together. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 My song is often heard during hot summer days.
🌳 I live in trees.
☀️ I am sometimes mistaken for a grasshopper, but I'm louder.
